what_to_watch: Foundation plan dimensions and pier/footing callouts
Roof framing member sizes and spacing
Connection details — bolted vs welded, embed plates
General structural notes (S0.1, S0.2) — concrete strength, steel grades, rebar specs
Typical details (S0.3, S0.4) — repeated across multiple locations
common_superintendent_questions: What steel connections are called out?
Where are the framing details for this area?
